lines.text:
[when she wants to stop helping a gangster friend]
This isn't a party you can leave when you get bored. We could have left, you and I, a long time ago. We were only guests then. But we stayed too late.
Don't talk to me about self-respect. That's something you tell yourself you got when you got nothing else. What kind of self-respect is there living on aspirin tablets and chicken salad sandwiches?
[beat]
Look Marty, the only thing that counts is that stuff you take to the bank, that filthy buck that everybody sneers at, but slugs to get.
[beat]

I know how you feel. You're a nice guy. But the world isn't for nice guys. You've got to kick and punch and belt your way up because nobody's going to give you a lift. You've got to do it yourself, cuz nobody cares about us except ourselves.
Don't talk to me about self-respect. That's something you tell yourself you got when you got nothing else.
He's promised me the world, Marty, and I've got to have it.
The only thing that counts is that stuff you take to the bank, that filthy buck that everybody sneers at, but slugs to get.

[at the roulette table]
What's happened to that system of yours, darling? I thought you always quit while you were still ahead.
stay to the bitter end.
[to croupier]
If you'll write out the obituary, I'll give you a check.

[intercepting and examining the check she's offered for her gambling losses]
Your check's no good, Mrs. Forbes.

[coldly]
My check's good anywhere.

[tearing up the check]
Except here.
[looks annoyed]
That's right. I'm fresh. But I'm also generous. Tonight, you're the guest of the house. Now tomorrow night, that's different. Tomorrow night you can lose your shirt.
[looks her over and bends closer]
I'll even pay to see that.
I'm gettin' myself a new partner!
You should get yourself a couple of other new items, if you'll pardon the expression.
[Ethel and George kiss]
You're asking for trouble, aren't you?
I never got anything yet worthwhile, without trouble. Only don't take this for anything more than it's worth.
It might be worth more than you think.
